content: @Brian Postlethwaite - this app you describe here - have you tested it against argonaut test systems?
I've yet to code it up, its one of my holiday projects.
@Brian Postlethwaite did this track come to anything?

Yes, we were able to run it against both Epic and Cerner.
(check the connectathon results tab ;))
Although not that many instances processed, still got a reasonable indication
I would like to see it tried out by others with other resource types.

The tool has decent command-line parameters for running it locally, and optionally sending results to a server (defaulting to https://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/TestReport)
https://github.com/brianpos/FhirResourceScanner/releases
